title: Italian pea soup
ingredients: ['40g butter', '2 small shallots, finely chopped', '3 teaspoons mixed herbs de Provence', '120ml dry Marsala wine', '350g fresh green peas', '700ml vegetable or chicken stock', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped parsley', '125ml single cream', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
